      This request removes the collaboration relation between the two employees passed as id1 and id2.

      If the two employees are not collaborators, return 404.

      Otherwise, Remove this collaboration relation.

    • Method Detail

      • addCollaborator

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> addCollaborator(java.lang.Long id1,
                                                                                java.lang.Long id2,
                                                                                java.lang.String format)
        This makes the two employees with the given IDs collaborators with each other.

        If either employee does not exist, return 404.

        If the two employees are already collaborators, do nothing, just return 200.

        Otherwise, Record this collaboration relation. If all is successful, return HTTP code 200 and any informative text message in the given format in the HTTP payload.
        Specified by:
        addCollaborator in interface ICollaborationAPI
        Parameters:
        id1: - Employee id
        id2: - Employee id
        format: - output format possible values are json or xml.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with response message indicating collaborator added

      • removeCollaborator

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ResponseMessage> removeCollaborator(java.lang.Long id1,
                                                                                   java.lang.Long id2,
                                                                                   java.lang.String format)
        This request removes the collaboration relation between the two employees passed as id1 and id2.

        If either employee does not exist, return 404.

        If the two employees are not collaborators, return 404.

        Otherwise, Remove this collaboration relation. Return HTTP code 200 and a meaningful text message if all is successful.
        Specified by:
        removeCollaborator in interface ICollaborationAPI
        Parameters:
        id1: - Employee id
        id2: - Employee id
        format: - output format possible values are json or xml.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with response message indicating collaborator removed
